section.header:
Episode 213
"A BICYCLOPS BUILT FOR TWO"
By
Eric Kaplan
Transcribed by Dave, The Neutral Planet
section.note: Opening Credits. Caption: This Episode Has Been Modified To Fit Your Primitive Screen.
Outside Planet Express. The Mailbot pushes the mail through the letterbox.
Cut to: Planet Express: Entrance. Nibbler barks as the letters come through the letterbox. They hit him and he runs away scared.
Cut to: Planet Express: Meeting Room. He runs in, runs around the table and is trodden on by Farnsworth who has just come through another door.

section.speak: Good news everyone! Several years ago I tried to log on to AOL, and it just went through! Wheee! We're online!
section.note: Planet Express: Farnsworth's Lab. The crew climb into what looks like some VR suits.

section.speak: Go ahead! Get into these net suits. I designed and tested them myself.
section.note: Leela sniffs her glove.

section.speak: It smells like burning recess monkey.
Really? I guess when you're around it all day you stop noticing. Off you go.
section.note: He presses a button and the crew disappear into the web.
Cut to: Outside Internet Browser. The crew have turned green and are holographic.

section.speak: Hey!
section.note: He puts his arm through himself and laughs. He ties his arms in knots.

section.speak: Behold! The internet!
section.note: He presses the enter button and a white light engulfs the crew.
Cut to: Internet Browser. The crew stand on a Tron-like clifftop.

section.speak: My God! It's full of ads!
section.note: The ads caw like birds and dive at the crew � la Alfred Hitchcock's The Birds. Amy and Zoidberg scream as the ads flutter around them. Hermes limbos out the way of one. Leela kicks the No Way and No buttons on the ads. One chases Bender around. Another flies at Fry and wraps itself around him. Leela pulls him free.

section.speak: Follow me!
section.note: The rest of the crew follow her and they fly off the clifftop towards the internet.

section.speak: It's immense.
It's got every piece of information anyone could ever want.
section.note: Fry sees the porn sites.

section.speak: So I see!
section.note: He flies down to the porn sites and Bender and Hermes follow him.

section.speak: What? What's going on here?
section.note: He sees a sign advertising Sardine On Mackeral Action, warbles and flies towards it.
Time Lapse. The crew wander around the porn infested internet. Amy sees a site called Amy Wong Naked. She pokes her head through the door.

section.speak: Hey, that's me!
No it isn't. I just took some pictures of your face and stuck them on someone else's body.
section.note: Leela sticks her head into the website.

section.speak: Hey!
section.note: Outside Adult Chatrooms. The crew join the queue. At the front of the queue several underage kids dressed as adults go in.

section.speak: Are you over 18?
Yes.

xml.section:
YOUNGER KID
Yes.
A baby spits its dummy out, gurgles and walks in.
Adult Chatrooms.

section.speak: I'm telling you Fry they've got a chatroom for everybody. And here it is.
section.note: He and Fry walk into a Filthy Filthy Chatroom.

section.speak: Ew, that is so gross!
Yeah. I'll stick with this one thank you.

xml.section:
AMY
Yeah.
They walk into a plain ordinary Filthy Chatroom.
Filthy Filthy Chatroom. Bender looks around chuckling. He pulls down a menu and selects a sexy nurse disguise. He taps a man on the shoulder.
BENDER (SEXFULLY) Hi, I'm a naughty nurse and I really need someone to talk to. 9.95 a minute.
MAN #2 Ooo, you're a dollar naughtier than most.
He hands "her" some cash and Bender pockets it.

BENDER
So how 'bout them Knicks?
Filthy Chatroom. Amy sits at a bar and a man makes a winky smiley face at her. She groans.
NERD #1 Hello? Are there any girls in this room at all?
NERD #2 Yeah, bring on the hot chicks 'cause I'm a hot stud.

section.speak:
Yeah!
NERD #3 So are we!
section.note: Leela pushes her way to the centre of the crowd.

section.speak:
I'm a woman if that's what you mean. I don't like to play games so I'll just say I'm a cyclops, I'm a spaceship captain, I'm the only one of my species and I'm interested in meeting a man.
NERD #4 A woman. I'm scared.
section.note: Internet Browser. The crew fly away from the chatrooms.

section.speak:
Well, thanks to the internet, I'm bored with sex. Is there a place on the web that panders to my lust for violence?
BENDER (SARCASTIC) Is the space pope reptilian?
section.note: Outside Death Factory III. The crew walk towards a colluseum-like gaming zone.

section.speak: Get ready for fun Fry. Nowadays we have a type of game played entirely on video.

We call it a "video game."
FRY (SARCASTIC) Uh, "video game" you say? Well golly gee, you mighty spacemen of the future will have to show me how it works.
section.note: Death Factory III. Fry has pretty much got the hang of the game. He runs around the death factory, laughing and dodging machines and shooting lasers from his fingers. He rolls under some squashy things, shoots some crates, shoots Donkey Kong and swings away on a rope. Amy shoots at him but misses. He shoots back and she shatters like glass. Another nerd shoots at him and Fry shoots back and shatters him. Hermes puts his finger to Fry's head but Fry leaps into the air, spins around and shatters Hermes. Bender and Leela shoot at him. Zoidberg slides down a rope chasing Fry and shooting.

section.speak: The doctor is in! The doctor is out.
section.note: He shatters. Farnsworth's head appears in the game.

section.speak: Everyone please sign off, we have a delivery. Plus I have to use the phone - Leela please tell the others that -
section.note: She shoots him. She kicks Bender into a machine and goes through the workings � la Modern Times. He comes out the other end like a slinky. He rolls down some steps and into some boiling lava. Farnsworth appears again and before he can speak Leela and Fry shoot him. Fry shoots at Leela but misses. She shoots back and he ducks behind a machine. Leela folows him warily. Someone backs into her and she screams and turns around. It is another cyclops.

section.speak: Who are you?
I saw you in the chatroom but you left before I had a chance to talk to you. After all these years of searching for another Cyclops.

xml.section:
LEELA
I can't believe it. I've dreamed of this moment all my life.

CYCLOPS
Do you think perhaps you and I - ?
Fry shoots and shatters the Cyclops. He laughs and ducks behind a machine.

section.speak: Fry, you idiot. Ever since I was abandoned on Earth I've been searching for who my people are and where they come from. Then I finally meet another Cyclops and you blast him. You wrecked my one chance to learn who I am.
section.note: Fry slowly walks behind the machine, finger at the ready.

section.speak: Oh Leela. I feel terrible. If there's anything I can ever do - Gotcha!
won! I'm the greatest!
section.note: Cut to: Planet Express: Farnsworth's Lab. Everyone else has taken off their netsuits. Fry is still in his, jumping around and laughing like an idiot.

section.speak: Come on. We have worked to do.
section.note: She pulls his goggles away and snaps them back.
Ship's Cockpit. Leela doesn't speak to Fry.

section.speak: Are you still mad at me for wrecking your once in a lifetime chance to learn the meaning of your existence?
No, I'm just happy you were able to win a video game. Now lets concentrate on getting this desperately needed popcorn to the people of Cineplex 14 OK?
section.note: The video screen comes down from the ceiling.

section.speak: Leela, you've got mail. It's not spam!

xml.section:
LEELA Huh? It's him!
CYCLOPS ON SCREEN To: Leela. Subject: Hello. I am Alkazar. Fortunately I wrote down your screenname before I was dispatched by that oaffish moron.

FRY
Kicked your ass!
ALKAZAR ON SCREEN Leela we have much to discuss. Please come join me on the planet of your birth. Co-ordinates follow.
Some co-ordinates appear on the screen and the email ends.

section.speak: Too bad we gotta make that urgent popcorn delivery.
section.note: She thinks about it and pulls a lever.

section.speak: It'll get there.
section.note: Cut to: Outside Ship. The cargo bay hatch opens and a crate of popcorn flies out. She ship turns around and flies away. The popcorn crate explodes and forms a spiral of popcorn.
Ship's Steps. The ship has landed on Planet Cyclopia, the door opens and the crew look at the planet. Ruins of a city with vines climbing them greet them.

section.speak: After a whole life of searching I may finally have found where I belong.
Too bad it's a dump.
section.note: Cyclopian Surface. Leela, Fry and Bender make their way through the vines and arrive in the middle of a city.

section.speak: Look at that statue. It's only got one eye.
Lazy sculptor!

xml.section:
ALKAZAR
Welcome home Leela.
She turns around. He is standing on a baclony.

section.speak: Alkazar? Are you real? Or am I seeing single?
section.note: She pokes him in the eye.

section.speak: Ow! Of course I'm real!
After all this time. Somebody else with one eye who isn't a clumsy carpenter or, uh, a kid with a BB gun.
section.note: They hug.

section.speak: It's alright Leela. You'll never be alone again. Let me introduce you to yourself. Do you mind if your servants walk?
Not at all!
section.note: The lizards pull them away. Bender steals the crown from the top of the statue and chuckles.
Time Lapse.

section.speak: We are the last remaining Cyclopses. Our planet is Cyclopia. This is our capital, Cyclops City. Stop me if I'm going too fast for you.
section.note: Leela looks around.

section.speak: There's so much information and yet somehow I feel as if I know it all already.
This sacred mosaic depicts our goddess of beauty.
section.note: The mosaic looks like Botticelli's The Birth of Venus.

section.speak: Hmm, you got any sacred artwork of her from the back?
Her perfect eye reminds me of yours Leela. Had our race survived, you would have been a temple priestess or a supermodel.

xml.section:
LEELA
Oh please! Really?
The carriage moves on. Bender takes the jewel from the middle of the mosaic eye.
Time Lapse. Alkazar shows them another statue.

section.speak: And there's the pirate Purple Beard, scourge of the six seas.
What's over that hill?

xml.section:
ALKAZAR
The Forbidden Valley. A holy sancturary where no one may tread.

FRY
Is that anything like a cemetary 'cause I gotta take a leak. Ow!

LEELA
Fry, that's offensive to our people. Isn't it?
He nods and she slaps Fry again.

section.speak: Ow!
section.note: Outside Alkazar's Castle.

section.speak: This is my home. I hope you don't think less of me because I live in a giant castle.
Oh no not at all. If anything, I'm more impressed.
section.note: Cut to: Alkazar's Castle. He throws open the doors. The castle is full of jewels. Bender's eyes zoom in.

section.speak: Ooo! I'm gonna need to make some room!
section.note: He opens his chest cabinet and takes out a goldfish bowl, a toaster, and another two goldfish bowls.
Cut to: Alkazar's Bedroom.

section.speak: In here's where I dream my lonely dreams and cook my simple meals.
It's all so sad. What happened to our people?
section.note: Alkazar looks at her and moves over to the window and looks out. A tear trickles down his face.

section.speak: Its too painful to speak of now. Come, I'll show you your quarters.
section.note: They leave. Bender sees a sword on the wall, checks no one is look and swallows it. The sword is a little too long and Bender can't walk properly. He clanks as he walks out.

section.speak: Ow! Ow! Ow!
section.note: Leela's Quarters. It is the middle of the night. Leela hears Alkazar crying and wakes up. She gets up and goes out to him.
Cut to: Alkazar's Balcony. Leela puts her hand on his shoulder.

section.speak: I heard you from my room. What's wrong?
It's just - no Leela. I don't want to see tears in your perfect eye.

xml.section:
LEELA
Please, is it bout the fate of our people? Because I'm very interested in that.

ALKAZAR
Well OK. But it's chilly and you're going to be all wet from the tears. Let's go into my chamber.
They walks inside.
Alkazar's Bedroom. Leela and Alkazar are sat on Alkazar's bed. Alkazar tells the story.
Flashback. Cyclops City is a thriving community with families, fountains and buskers.
ALKAZAR (VOICE OVER) It wasn't long ago. Our people were happy and prosperous...
The flashback cuts to a dark planet with rocky terrain and lots of large molehills.
ALKAZAR (VOICE OVER) ...but the eyeless mole people of Subterra 3 grew jealous of our visual proness. They fired missile in all directions hoping to hit Cyclopia.
A mole man presses a button and several hundred missiles are launched from the planet.
ALKAZAR (VOICE OVER) Unfortunately, one of the 40 planets hit, was ours.
On Cyclopia a Cyclopian scientist looks through a telescope at the sky.

section.speak: How far away do you think it is?

xml.section:
SCIENTIST
A trillion miles?
The missile lands right behind them and explodes.
Flashback ends.

section.speak: Things got hot. You look a little hot, you can take off that jacket. Our people don't like to be hot. Anyway, just before the impact...
section.note: Flashback. In a Cyclopian hospital a doctor delivers a baby.
section.speak:
Our smartest scientists managed to save one baby
The doctor puts the baby in a rocket and the parents wave it goodbye.
Flashback ends.
Alkazar, I used to be a baby, it might have been me!
section.note: Flashback. Cyclops City is in flames.
section.speak:
Fortunately I was employed as a pool cleaner at the time and when I emerged from retrieving a dead possum, I found I was the only one left.
Alkazar sees the flames, screams, and falls to his knees in a very overdramatic way.
Flashback ends.
It's so tragic.

xml.section:
ALKAZAR
Yes, but the real tragedy is that our race ends with us.

LEELA
It doesn't have to.

ALKAZAR
What do you mean?

LEELA
You're a male and I'm a female.

ALKAZAR
I'm still not following you.
She pushes him onto the bed and kisses him.
Time Lapse. Morning has broken. Leela and Alkazar are in bed. Alkazar is asleep. Leela wakes up.

section.speak: Wake up my king.
section.note: Alkazar wakes up and coughs.

section.speak: Oh jeez what a night. Make me some coffee would you.
section.note: He puts his head back on the pillow.

section.speak: Uh, sure OK. What do you take with that?
Pancakes and sausage. Kitchen's in the basement, pans are in the attic.

xml.section:
LEELA
Maybe after breakfast we can talk about rebuilding our civilisation.
Alkazar snores loudly.
Alkazar's Dining Room. Fry and Bender eat with Leela and Alkazar. Fry eats a pancake.

section.speak: Mmm! Great pancakes Leela!
Yeah they'll come in handy if I need to cover any tiny manholes. Listen hun, we don't want to look like slobs in front of the other species do we?

xml.section:
LEELA
No.

ALKAZAR
So get to work on these dishes. And then organise my collection of naked celebrity photos by name and what you can see.

LEELA
Look Alkazar.

ALKAZAR
Call me Al.

LEELA
Look Al. I know you've been living alone a long time and I can sympathise but I'm not your maid.

ALKAZAR
You're right, I'm sorry. It looks like the relationshipisn't going to work afterall. So much for the Cyclops race. I thought it was a pretty good race but -
Leela gets up.

section.speak: OK OK, I'll do the dishes. Hey where'd they go?
section.note: Bender walks out clanking...
Outside Alkazar's Castle. Fry and Bender watch Leela pegging out the washing.

section.speak: Ah, Leela's experiencing the greatest joy a woman can feel: Worshipping some lowlife jerk.
He may be some lowlife jerk but I don't trust him. I think he's hiding something and I'm gonna find out what it is.
section.note: Outside Forbidden Valley. Fry strolls up to the gate and reads the No Trespassing sign. He laughs.

section.speak: Try and stop me!
section.note: He hops over the gate and a trap door opens underneath him and he falls down a deep hole.
Alkazar's Living Room. Alkazar is sat on a couch staring at a TV. Enter Leela dressed up like Peg Bundy from Married...With Children.

section.speak: Al? I did my hair the way you wanted it. Who are these people?
section.note: There is a pig, a rat man and a rat woman sat on another couch.

section.speak: Friends.
Hey, where'd you get this couch and that TV set and all this stuff?

xml.section:
ALKAZAR
They were giving it away on the street corner. Just like you Leela.
Alkazar's friends cheer and hoot.

section.speak: Too bad they weren't giving away the three things you actually need: Mouthwash, a back wax and stain-proof underwear.
section.note: More hooting.

section.speak: You go girl!
By the way your pal Fry fell into the dungeon. Feed him a taco so he doesn't die and stink up the place.

xml.section:
LEELA
Come on Al, can't you let the little guy out?

ALKAZAR
Jeez Leela, twice in one day? I'm not Superman!
The rats and pig cheer widly. Leela leaves.
Outside Dungeon. Leela crouches down to a little barred window which Fry is behind. He eats his taco.

section.speak: Why were you sneaking into my people's forbidden valley?
'Cause I think Alkazar's hding something. Listen Leela, you may not like it, you may not believe it, you may not wanna hear it but Alkazar's a jerk, he's bad for you. He -

xml.section:
LEELA
I know.

FRY
You do?

LEELA
Fry if it's obvious to you with your learning disability then of course it's obvious to me! He's crude and gross and he treats me like a slave.

FRY
Then dump his one eyed ass.

LEELA
I can't. If I leave Alkazar then that's the end of the Cyclops race. And I won't let that happen. Even if that means a lifetime of unhappiness.
A toilet flushes.
The pig and rats hoot.

section.speak: I'll break up with him at dinner.
I'll be there.
section.note: Time Lapse. Fry is at dinner. The table is right next to his window.

section.speak: Yo Leela, what gives? Pig says your slop tastes like crap.
Yeah, like crap.
section.note: Fry tugs Leela's leg.

section.speak: C'mon Leela you deserve better than this guy! Dump him already!
I'm trying.
section.note: Alkazar taps his glass.

section.speak:
Hey everyone jam a sock in your spit faucets. Not long ago I spent my lonely nights renting slash flicks with Rat Man and his girlfriend. But then a beautiful woman arrived and - stop eating pig! And she brought new hope for me and our once great civilisation. Now a million centuries of Cyclops destiny depend on the answer to one question......Leela, will you marry me?
FRY (WHISPERING) No! No!
Yes! I Will!

xml.section:
FRY
Ohh!
The table applauds. Alkazar and Leela kiss. Rat Woman elbows Rat Man.

section.speak: They're getting married!
section.note: Rat Man looks surprised.
Outside Alkazar's Castle. A limo pulls up and Amy, Farnsworth, Zoidberg and Hermes climb out.

section.speak: Congratulations Leela!
Hello!

xml.section:
HERMES
Oh this is great!
Pre-Wedding Chug-A-Thon. Everyone helps themselves to the buffet. Leela puts a decoration on top of the wedding cake of a Cyclops woman buffing a Cyclops man's shoes. Fry attracts her attention.

section.speak: Pst, Leela. you've got to get me out of here. It's horrible, eating scraps, letting my waste drop wherever it falls like an animal in the zoo.
Animals go in the corner.

xml.section:
FRY
The corner! Why didn't I think of that?
Leela sighs.

section.speak: Look Fry I'd like to help you but it's my wedding and I'm kind of busy. Here, try to be happy for me. That way at least one of us will be.
section.note: Cut to: Dungeon. Leela walks away from the window.

section.speak: That's it! It's time for this bird to walk.
section.note: He hits the bottle against the door trying to get it open. The cork flies out of the bottle, out of the dungeon and hits the door release button. The door opens. Fry laughs and tip the bottle over his head. The door starts to close again. He screams and scrambles through it.

Cut to: Outside Alkazar's Castle. Fry runs out and looks around. Bender is leaning against a tree. Rope is holding his door shut because its so full of stuff he's stolen. There is also a sack next to him. Fry sees him.

section.speak: Bender come on. We've got to get some dirt on Alkazar. Lets go and find out what makes the Forbidden Valley so forbidden.
Uh no thanks I'm good.

xml.section:
FRY
But there's probably some cool forbidden stuff you can steal.

BENDER
I don't know Fry. For the first time in my life I feel like I've stolen enough.
Fry slaps him.

section.speak: Bender, snap out of it!
section.note: And he does.

xml.section:
BENDER
Sorry I don't know what came over me. Let's go. (singing) I love stealing, I love taking things!
Wedding. Alkazar yawns. Hermes plays a grooby version of Here Comes The Bride and Farnsworth walks Leela up the aisle. Zoidberg wipes his eyes.
ZOIDBERG (CRYING) That pig over there is wearing the same sandals as me.
Outside Forbidden Valley. Bender and Fry ride Alkazar's lizards towards the gate.

section.speak: Come on boy, jump! Good boy!
section.note: Cut to: Forbidden Valley. Fry and Bender come to a clifftop.

section.speak: Whoa Mittens!
section.note: They look out over the valley and gasp.

section.speak: My God! Four identical castles!
Each more identical than the last!
section.note: Ruined City. Fry and Bender come to a statue similar to the one in Cyclops City.

section.speak: That's weird. It's another Cyclops, only this one has five eyes.
section.note: Bender sees another Birth Of Venus style mosaic.

section.speak: And here's another one with no eyes.
section.note: He takes the jewels from her eyes.
Wedding.

section.speak: Does anyone have a reason why this couple shall not be joined in the irrevocable shackles of holy bliss?
Saving a race of one-eyed monsters? Who could object to that?
section.note: Leela looks worried.

section.speak: Cut to the chase Preach!
Do you Alkazar......takethiswomanbeforeyou...tolove..insickness..do you part?

xml.section:
ALKAZAR
Yeah sure I do come on faster!

PREACHERBOT
Do you Leela, copy and paste his response til death do you part?
Leela looks around. Zoidberg waves, the rats and pig watch a TV. She look sat Alkazar. He eggs her on.

section.speak: I..d -
section.note: Enter Fry and Bender on the lizards. Everyone gasps.

section.speak: Oh my God!
What the?

xml.section:
FRY
Hey Alkazar, you left somebody off the guest list.
Enter a 5-eyed cyclops.
5-

section.speak: Alkazar, why you are so late for our wedding? And why you have only one eye?

It, uh, oo! Uh, hey sweetie, just go back to the castle and wait for me. She, she's nuts, I can morph into a 5-eyed alien and I kinda said I'd marry her. But I'm really a Cyclops and I'm really going to marry you.

xml.section:
FRY
Oh yeah? Then what about this?
Enter a rhino woman named Sandy. Alkazar morphs.

section.speak:
This is a bit awkward.
5-
Who's she?

xml.section:
LEELA
Who's she?

SANDY
Who are they?

ALKAZAR
Go back to the castle Sandy.

FRY
And maybe you'd like to meet her. And her.
Enter another thing. Alkazar morphs into each of them and eventually morphs into all five at once.

section.speak: Leela, this must all be ver confusing.
A little. That's why I've decided to hurt you until you explain it.
section.note: She kicks him. 5-Eyes pushes him back, Leela kicks him again.

section.speak: Show us your real form!

Yeah!
THING #2 Do it!
section.note: Thing #1 screeches.
Sandy picks Alkazar up and throws him and Leela kicks him into a table which collapses under him. Everyone gathers round. He crawls out. He looks like a grasshopper.

section.speak: Well, this is the real me. But I can explain. We all have needs. Mine was to make it with five weirdos and have them scrub my five castles. I gave you all what you wanted and of course

xml.section:
I made a few bucks letting Pig watch through the two way mirror. Can any of you sa you wouldn't have done the exact same thing in my position?
Bender cries.
BENDER (CRYING) He's a saint!

section.speak: But why did you have all five weddings on the same day?
Hey lady, you got any idea how much it costs to rent a tux that changes shape?

xml.section:
LEELA
Alright Alkazar, I just have one last question for you.

ALKAZAR
What's that?

LEELA
If you can change form, why didn't you change it in the one place that counts?
Everyone cheers and hoots.
Ship's Cockpit. The ship flies away from the planet, with Amy at the controls. Bender admires his sack of loot. Leela sits on the arm of the couch with Fry and Farnsworth.

section.speak: Thanks for saving me from that creep Fry.
Hey, that's what I do.

xml.section:
LEELA
I guess I was so desperate to find out who I really was, I forgot who I really was.

FARNSWORTH
No harm done. In the many decades you'll work to repay me for that shipment of popcorn you destroyed, you'll have plenty of time to search for your true home.
Leela gets up and stares out of the window.

LEELA Yeah. I mean, how many planets can there be?
She looks out into the vastness of space and the ship glides away.
THE END
